56586.<voice 00287_00056586><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00287_00056586><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001><pc>! We meet yet again. There's
nothin' in Astoltia I don't know! It's your
pal, Wandering Sage Hollow.<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56587.<voice 00456_00056587><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00456_00056587><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>Ya've been through a lot too, haven't you?
Beyond the Mystifying Mist, we had reached
an unknown Lendersia.<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56588.<voice 00511_00056588><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00511_00056588><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>The first Magic Compass I made only had the ability
to clear the Mystifying Mist, but nothing else. I was
unaware, be that as it may, I'm sorry about that.<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56589.<voice 00566_00056589><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00566_00056589><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>...However, when I was told that Gran Zedora
could not be reached, I immediately began
to examine powering-up the Magic Compass.<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56590.<voice 00636_00056590><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00636_00056590><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>Now, ya should be able to go to both Gran Zedora and
the other world's Cocolata Beach too as much as ya
like! Hohoho, it's pretty useful if I say so myself.<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000110.<voice 00637_29000110><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00637_29000110><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>Hmm? Come to think of it, there's a new
face added to yer group.<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000111.<voice 00638_29000111><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00638_29000111><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>Hmm...No, no. No need to introduce yourself.
Even if I'm a simple sage, without so much
as a word, I clearly understand...<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000114.<voice 00641_29000114><start_lip_sync c0:
<voice 00641_29000114><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>...Umm, Hollow? I am Gran Zedora Castle's
princess, Anlucia. Have you forgotten...?<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000115.<voice 00642_29000115><start_lip_sync c0:
<voice 00642_29000115><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>...Now that I have awakened as the hero, I
have come to greet you.<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000116.<voice 00643_29000116><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00643_29000116><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>Oh oh, I see, I see... Yer royal and elegant
face is that of Hero Princess Anlucia's,
without a doubt.<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000117.<voice 00644_29000117><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00644_29000117><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>Of course I remembered ya. My, ya've
become quite elegant. I was just pulling a
little prank!<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000118.<voice 00645_29000118><start_lip_sync c0:
<voice 00645_29000118><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>Hah... Is that so. The details are in
this letter.<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000119.<voice 00875_29000119><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00875_29000119><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>Mmm. Not much of a kidder, eh... What's
that? You brought a letter for me? Well why
didn't ya say so earlier!<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56593.<voice 00980_00056593><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00980_00056593><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>T-t-that's...!
A letter from Lushenda...!?<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56594.<voice 01035_00056594><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 01035_00056594><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>H-hey! You! <pc>! Lushenda has ya
workin' for her, does she?<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56595.<voice 01085_00056595><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 01085_00056595><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>N-no...It's not the time for me to pry.
<pc> can't be leaving empty-handed.
I havta finish up that research somehow...<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56596.<voice 01165_00056596><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 01165_00056596><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>Say, <pc>, give me a hand! I'm putting the
finishing touches on the letter for ya to deliver to

56597.<voice 01225_00056597><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 01225_00056597><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>Purifying Herbs are said to be dropped by

56610.<voice 01400_00056610><start_lip_sync n0:

56611.<voice 01465_00056621><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 01465_00056621><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>Tsk tsk... Luckland Station's

56623.<voice 01690_00056623><start_lip_sync n0:
